name: off
text:
参考書、開きっぱなし
シャープペン、転がりっぱなし
trans:
Textbook, left open.
Mechanical pencil, somewhere on the table.

name: off
text: ノートの表紙、よれよれ

name: 円香
text:
……ちょっとテーブル拭く
ふたりともノート上げて
trans:
...I'll wipe the table.
Lift your notebooks, you two.

name: 円香
text: 飲み物、置きっぱなしだから
trans: Because you're leaving your drink everywhere.

name: 円香
text:
片付けたら
もう勉強しないでしょ
trans:
Why don't we clean up?
We're not studying anyways.

name: 雛菜
text:
じゃあ雛菜
また何か買ってこよ～！
trans:
In that case,
Hinana will go and buy something～!

name: 透
text:
うん
落ちそう、あの人のやつ
trans:
Yep.
His prize, it might fall.

name: 透
text: ──雛菜、行くって言ってたから

name: 小糸
text:
お、お待たせ……！
透ちゃん、円香ちゃん……！
trans:
S-Sorry for the wait...!
Toru-chan, Madoka-chan...!

name: 小糸
text:
ご、ごめんね、遅くなっちゃって……
雛菜ちゃんは……？
trans:
S-sorry for being late...
Where's Hinana-chan...?

name: 透
text:
買いに行った
なんか
trans:
She went out.
To buy something.

name: 小糸
text:
そうなんだ……！
みんなはもう課題終わっちゃった？
trans:
I see...!
Did everyone already finish their homework?

name: 透
text:
全然
ちょっと休憩中

name: 円香
text: ちょっとっていうか、ずっとね
trans: Currently? More like the whole time.

name: 透
text:
じゃあ、やろ
小糸ちゃん来たし
trans:
Let's do it, then.
Koito-chan is here too.

name: off
text: やらないと終わらない
trans: If you don't do it, it'll never be finished.

name: off
trans: But if you do, at least it'll end.

name: 雛菜
text:
ね、見て～！
プリンパイ！

name: 雛菜
trans: The pastry shop on the 1st floor had some!

name: 円香
text: そんなところまで行ってきたの？

name: 円香
text:
小糸、シェイク
──溶けるよ、どうでもいいけど
trans:
Koito, your shake.
──It's dripping. Not that I care, though.

name: 円香
text: ……課題、少し休んでからにしたら？

name: 小糸
text:
あ……でも来るの遅くなっちゃったし
す、すぐに終わらせてみんなに追いつくよ……！
trans:
Ah... But I arrived late, so I'll just finish this
quick and catch up with everyone else...!

name: 円香
text:
じゃ、やりながらでいいから
口開けて、ポテト
trans:
While you're working, then...
Open wide. French fry.

name: off
text: 小糸、ちゃんとしてるね

name: off
trans: Eat lots, once in a while.

name: 小糸
text: ふぁっ、まふぉかしゃん

name: 小糸
text: これたふぇきれふぁい……

name: 雛菜
text:
ん～
プリンパイ食べたらね～？
trans:
Hmm～
After I eat my pudding pie, okay～?

name: off
trans: The one who never stops eating.

name: 透
text:
アイス、トリプルカップ
食べていいよ
trans:
Ice-cream, triple scoop.
You can have some.

name: 透
text:
イチゴ、チョコミント──
……あと……バニラ？

name: 円香
text: 自分で買ったんでしょ
trans: You bought it yourself, didn't you?

name: 透
text:
でも
どうせ混ざるし、味
trans:
But... it'll just mix anyways.
The flavors.

name: 円香
text:
乗せて食べれば
──プリンパイに
trans:
What if you eat it together?
──With the pudding pie.

name: off
trans: The one who doesn't really care.

name: off
text: ほんとくだらないことしかしてない
trans: We're all just doing pointless things right now.

name: off
text:
でも、そろそろ戻らないとね
やることをやる、生活に
trans:
Eventually we have to go back.
Back to living our lives, doing what we have to do.

name: 円香
trans: I'll have a bite of that ice-cream too.

name: 円香
text: 食べ終わったら帰ろう
trans: Let's go home after we finish eating.

name: 透
text:
終わってないけどね
課題
trans:
Though we're not finished.
With our homework.

name: 円香
text: そりゃね、ほぼやってないから
trans: Well, of course. We barely did anything.

name: off
trans: But doing nothing was satisfying, somehow.

name: off
text:
参考書、閉じる
シャープペン、拾う
trans:
Textbook, closed.
Mechanical pencil, picked up.

name: off
text: 表紙がよれよれのノート、仕舞う

name: off
text: 硬い本と、硬い本の間に
